price: 43.Qhureyshey sin koros maay tayse, woo korosuy siinik duma sugtey finqisnek, hinnak yallih digaalak amaan (saay) maay liton ambiyal obte kitoobah addal?
arabic: أَكُفَّارُكُمۡ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أُوْلَٰٓئِكُمۡ أَمۡ لَكُم بَرَآءَةٞ فِي ٱلزُّبُرِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: akuffārukum khayrun min ulāikum am lakum barāatun fī al-zuburi
